timeline.message:
Merge pull request #1 from constellation-app/master

Update fork with master

Merge pull request #2 from constellation-app/master

update master from origin

:art: fixed various warnings (deprecated, cast, import)
:art: added apache commons text dependency, as StringEscapeUtils was moved there from lang3
:art: dependency updates
:art: auto-formatted all code
:art: removed unneccessary comment lines

Merge pull request #3 from constellation-app/master

Update Branch

Merge pull request #3 from constellation-app/master

Update master

Add zero value check to stepLimit

Prevent divide by zero event

Fix for issue #191

Fix for Null pointer when showing transaction in New Table View. Changed logic on line 212 to check if the stateLock != null rather than stateLock == null. Originally, it was getting the stateLock if it was null causing the error.

Handle dimming at close of interaction

Allow update of state on hierarchical clustering to undim when interactivity is turned off

code cleanup

remove extra intentation
Use VisualConcept.VertexAttribute(X,Y,Z) rather than magic strings.
Disable interactive K-truss when K-Truss panel closed. ensure disabling interactive while open turns off any colouring of graph.

Merge pull request #184 from cygnus-x-1/general-improvements

general-improvements

Merge pull request #192 from aldebaran30701/Cluster-empty-graph-187

Cluster empty graph #187

Merge pull request #194 from formalhaut69/Null-Pointer-when-showing-transaction-in-New-Table-View-#191

Fix for issue #191 Null pointer when showing transaction in new table view

Merge pull request #195 from aldebaran30701/Hierarcical-dimming-64

Hierarcical dimming 64
#152 Use higher quality images for country flags
Merge branch 'master' into Update-country-flags

:art: Properties file cleanup
* Remove the double slash introduced during a recent PR merge
No longer restore interactive on/off setting when re-opening KTruss panel.

changed http to https for Maven central

this was previously causing a error 501 from the Maven servers

Merge pull request #4 from constellation-app/master

Update Master
Hot-Fix #158 Graph Creation

Merge pull request #205 from aldebaran30701/Revert-#158-to-fix-#202

Revert #158 to fix #202
Implement fix for #158

Merge pull request #5 from constellation-app/master

Update Master
Merge branch 'master' into DAV-Graph-Creation
Code Formatting
Update comment accuracy

Merge pull request #204 from itachi46/https-maven

changed http to https for Maven central

Merge pull request #1 from constellation-app/master

Updating fork from origin

Update TimelineTopComponent.java

Added null checks for presence of graph prior to using it in timeline updates.

Merge pull request #6 from constellation-app/master

Update Master
Merge branch 'master' into DAV-Graph-Creation

Update TimelineTopComponent.java

Wrapped populateFromGraph with populateFromGraphNode which ensures graphNode is non null prior to extracting graph from it.
Add GraphState for newly built graph
Added references to new flag assets

Merge pull request #200 from sol695510/Update-country-flags

#152 Use higher quality images for country flags

Merge pull request #207 from serpens24/feature/issue#193

Add checks for null graph prior to refreshing graphs timezone. (feature/issue#193)

Merge pull request #206 from aldebaran30701/DAV-Graph-Creation

Dav graph creation fix #158

Merge pull request #4 from constellation-app/master

update master

Merge pull request #2 from constellation-app/master

Update master
Merge branch 'master' into feature/issue#62

Merge pull request #199 from serpens24/feature/issue#62

Handle K-Truss interactive state changes (Feature/issue#62)

Merge pull request #5 from constellation-app/master

Update Master

Fix for issue #24 The Map View constantly resets itself

Modified the resize listener to add a half second delay to the map view resize event.

Merge pull request #210 from formalhaut69/The-Map-View-constantly-resets-itself-#24-

The map view constantly resets itself #24

init CI (#209)

* :white_check_mark: add Travis CI to repository

:bug: "Open in New Table View" context menu now works correctly
:bug: Icon Graph now performs a grid arrangement to prevent all generated nodes being rendered on top of each other
Merge branch 'new-fonts' of https://github.com/constellation-app/constellation into font-improvements
:art: corrected a rogue comma
:art: improved formatting
Merge branch 'new-fonts' of https://github.com/constellation-app/constellation into font-improvements

:sparkles: added ConstellationLabelFonts interface to allow programmatic
specification of label font defaults, and default implementation
DefaultLabelFonts
:art: refactored LabelFontsOptionsPanel and
LabelFontsOptionsPanelController to make use of default label font
settings
:art: updated changelog.md

Merge pull request #6 from constellation-app/master

Update Master
Fix for DAV-freeze-issue-#170

Fix for Dav freeze issue #170
--added a comment to highlight a TODO
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/constellation-app/constellation into font-improvements

timeline.bodyText:
Code formatting: Brace at end of lines.

Starting brace goes on same line, end brace goes on its own
timeline.author: aldebaran30701

timeline.message:
:art: updated label fonts options panel based on feedback
:art: moved all glyph classes to the glyph folder
:art: moved ui icons to a ui folder
:art: moved docs images to resources folders
:art: updated image references in docs to include alt tags
:art: separated icons in the arrangement module
